title: Pu`uhonua O H≈çnaunau National Historical Park: Eating & Sleeping
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Eating & Sleeping             Eating & Sleeping       Picnic tables and charcoal grills are available for everyone and may not be reserved. Large groups of 20 persons or more must obtain a permit in advance to use the area. Permit inquiries can be made by calling (808) 328-2326 ext 1220. In order to preserve the natural landscape, umbrellas, tarps and other such equipment as well as recreational activities are not permitted.
